name: Robert FELDER, Petitioner v. COMMON PLEAS COURT OF the FIRST JUDICIAL DISTRICT OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY et al., Respondents
name_abbreviation: Felder v. Common Pleas Court of the First Judicial District

parties: Robert FELDER, Petitioner v. COMMON PLEAS COURT OF the FIRST JUDICIAL DISTRICT OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY et al., Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 6th day of July, 2012, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED. To the extent the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief requests extraordinary relief, it is DENIED. To the extent the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief requests mandamus relief, it is GRANTED. The Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia County is directed to dispose of Petitioner’s pending filings within 120 days of our order.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
47 A.3d 1176
Robert FELDER, Petitioner v. COMMON PLEAS COURT OF the FIRST JUDICIAL DISTRICT OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY et al., Respondents.
No. 60 EM 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 6, 2012.
